resources.string: Welcome to The F1 data app

If you are a formula one fan, or you just want to know the previous results, this app will suits you perfectly. Swipe right to access the navigation menu and to get information of how to use this app.
This page helps you use this app. Follow the instructions below

1. To navigate, you can use the menu bar on the left side.I assume you already know that.

2. Select what kind of result you want to see and press on them.

3. You can select which year you want the result to be shown from.

4. Finally, press search and you will see the result.


If anything happened to be unclear, feel free to contact the developer.
This app was made as a home project.\nEvery resource the app is using is under free to use license, although those cannot be used in any kind of commercial purposes.
